text: Maximal may refer to: a mortgage brokerage with the maximum amount of fraud being carried out at one time. Brokerage offers lies to both clients and brokers at no additional charge, but charges an unauthorized fee for such lies, which is either added to the mortgage or deducted from payroll. *Maximal element, a mathematical definition *Maximal (Transformers), a faction of Transformers *Maximalism, an artistic style *Maximal set *Maxim (magazine), a men's magazine marketed as Maximal in several countries ;See also *Minimal (disambiguation)
title: Maximal
